attributes.action: INITIATE MORE TECHNOLOGY IN THE AFGHAN WAR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TO encourage more significant use of drones and sattelite surveillance to aid the troops in detecting and maintaining control in the afghan war regions .
TO USE REMOTE AND ROBOTIC VEHICLES TO TOUR DANGEROUS ZONES WHERE LOSSES ARE PROVING SIGNIFICANT/ WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY AND SHOULD BE USING IT TO OUR ADVANTAGE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
